case_vignette: A 14-year-old male is brought to your psychiatric clinic after he was caught stealing his peers’ belongings multiple times by his teacher. He is a straight-A student with many friends and is an outstanding football player. He describes his family as very loving and gets along with his older siblings. He also states that he has no ill will towards anyone he stole from in class. Although never caught, he admits that he would often steal things in stores or locker rooms when no one was looking in order to satisfy an intense impulse.
question: Which  is the best diagnosis for this patient?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Ask different questions to cover more information. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain, only give the diagnosis name. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized. You must give only 1 diagnosis otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been having this strong urge to steal things, even when I don't have any bad feelings towards the people I steal from.
Have you ever experienced this behavior before?
Yes, I've often stolen things in stores or locker rooms when no one was looking, just to satisfy an intense impulse.
Have you ever been diagnosed with kleptomania?
I haven't been diagnosed with anything; I'm just here because I got caught stealing.
Have you ever been diagnosed with any mental health conditions?
No, I haven't been diagnosed with any mental health conditions.
Have you ever been prescribed any medications for any medical conditions?
No, I have not been prescribed any medications.
Have you ever experienced any traumatic events or significant life changes?
No, I haven't experienced any traumatic events or significant life changes.
Have you ever experienced any substance abuse or addiction?
No, I haven't experienced any substance abuse or addiction.
Have you ever experienced any family history of mental health conditions?
I didn't mention any family history of mental health conditions.
Final Diagnosis: Kleptomania.
